entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitecourt Airport 2:48 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 90 %

Wind: WSW 4 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:30 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Rain showers and flurries overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 2:30 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:30 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
